content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with scheduling your plumbing service, may I please have your full name?
Thank you, John. Could you please provide the address where the service is needed?
Uh, well, it’s kind of hard to say exactly, I’m not sure what the full address would be, really.
I understand, John. To confirm our ability to service your location, I need a full street address. Could you please provide it?
Look, I don’t have the exact address right now. Maybe I can get it later?
I’m sorry, John, but without the service address, I can’t proceed with scheduling. If you get the address, feel free to contact us again. Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services!
